alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Nemaha (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 3:21PM CDT until May 30 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Nemaha County in northeastern Kansas... Eastern Marshall County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 321 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Lillis, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Nemaha and eastern Marshall Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
